entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:24 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: SNOW SQUALL WARNING ENDED, Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:25 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 08:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure: 100.1 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 76 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -10.7°C
Wind: WSW 32 km/h gust 48 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Flurries with risk of snow squalls. Local blowing snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Sunday 25 December 2022
